Sentencas: A sluggish oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) is an inveterate challenge limiting the performance of solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: Surface modification through the infiltration of nanoparticles is recognized as a facile technique to enhance the performance of state-of-the-art cathode materials.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: However, achieving stoichiometric uniformity and thermal stability of infiltrated nanoparticles needs further exploration.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: In this study, we demonstrate a novel ultrasonic spray infiltration technique to realize the surface modification of a La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta/Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta composite cathode through the infiltration of a Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta cathode catalyst.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: Infiltration by this new technique dramatically reduces the area-specific ohmic and polarization resistances, resulting in twofold enhanced performance of the anode-supported SOFC.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: In contrast, only a slight increase in the performance is achieved by infiltration through a micropipette.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: The performance improvement through ultrasonic spray infiltration is attributed to the uniform dispersion of the catalyst in the form of a nanolayer.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: Moreover, TEM analysis has revealed an epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta forming a layered perovskite structure at the La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta/Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3-delta interface leading to sustained high-performance outcomes.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: On the contrary, infiltration by micropipette did not produce such uniform morphology of infiltrated nanoparticles and also indicated elemental segregation giving rise to impure phase formation.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration

Sentencas: The ultrasonic spray infiltration technique proposed here represents a viable and commercializable solution to produce SOFCs with high and stable performances.
Titulo: Facile surface modification of LSCF/GDC cathodes by epitaxial deposition of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3via ultrasonic spray infiltration
